articles.title: 2021 LOCAL ELECTIONS ANALYSIS: Load shedding is South Africa's blight – and the ANC is to blame for it - Daily Maverick
articles.description: This is the nub of the ANC’s problem – there is no one else to blame for load shedding – as well as so many other problems plaguing South Africa. Pointing fingers in anyone else’s direction is hypocrisy at best, lies at worst.
articles.content: Last week South Africa was plunged into Stage 4 load shedding. Having massive countrywide power cuts is bad for any governing party in any country in the world never mind just before voters cast thei… [+6836 chars]
